column5: Come stay like a KING or a QUEEN on KINGSWAY DR in The Middle East Room. It's small, perfect for one person, cozy for two, but very nice and comfortable, with a queen size bed and a share bathroom with shower/tub, in a townhouse with 2 1/2 bath 2 miles to UTA  4 miles to AT&T stadium, Globe Life Ballpark, Six Flags 11 miles to Verizon/Nokia Theater 17 mi  We can arrange pick-ups from anywhere in the DFW area as well as the airports for an additional fee. See the Getting Around section below.
column8: Arlington btwn Dallas & Ft Worth*Middle East Room
